Man, please help me. I've already downloaded the dvd-9 file, so i'm not downloading again the dvd-5.

rudacury:

You can get the ESR Program that Im using here:
http://host-a.net/CivicScootin/PS2%20ESR%20Patcher%20%28Win%20and%20Linux%29.zip

Just drag and drop the ISO to the program and it will patch the game for you
OR
Hit "PATCH" with in the program and search for the ISO you want to patch with ESR..

Once patching is complete just burn and play

Later,
Civic/Scootin
Hey can some1 help. i downloaded the patched version but when i want to play it says u cant play without the microphone can i play it without microphone if i can how?thx in advance

@liudux123: You need a guitar or drum or mic in order to play this..

You just cant use a PS2 controller only..
